resources.string: Note that this filters list is not representative of the final version which will contain many more options.

Enter the decision in the provided text field.
 Press the plus button to add the option to the list.
 Press the minus button to remove the option from the list.
 To use weights, select the Use Weights checkbox. Weights specify how likely the option will be chosen relative to the other options.
 Example: If option 1 has a weight of 5 and option 2 has a weight of 3, then option 1 will be chosen 5/8 of the time, and option 2 will be chosen 3/8 of the time.

Enter the name of a product or general item you want to search for.
 Once the product has been entered, clicking the arrow next to it will open a screen that allows you to choose which website's results to look at.
 The websites are Amazon, Newegg, and eBay. You can compare results from the various sites by navigating to each of them in turn.
 Once on the website, hitting the back button will move back through your browsing history. Hitting the up button in the upper left corner of the screen will take you back to the website selection screen.
